title: 325: CHATTY BROS: PJ Joins The Bros!! + A Bro Bach Recap! + More!
itunes:title: 325: CHATTY BROS: PJ Joins The Bros!! + A Bro Bach Recap! + More!
description:
The Bros are back and Grayston and Evan are joined by the one and only PPPJJJJJJJ Henderson Jr.!! But first they catch up on some family plans and drama, spirituality, and chat Michelle’s season of the show - specifically Nayte VS. Joe! And then they are joined by PJ where they chat his style, being a reality star at the firehouse, thoughts on Michelle and the show, his dad, and much more!

PJ HENDERSON JR:

Follow PJ on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/th3_may0r/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc starter kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup +  free US shipping!

***OLIVE & JUNE: Visit OLIVEANDJUNE.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off your first Mani System!

***ETTITUDE: get 20% off your order + free shipping at ETTITUDE.COM/CHATTY and enter promo code CHATTY

***EVERLYWELL: Go to EVERYLWELL.COM/CHATTY for 20% off your at-home lab test!

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/
